    • getPlayerHead

      public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getPlayerHead(String name)
      gets the head of a player as an ItemStack, can only be used for page monitoring in gui's
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the head you want('MHF_ArrowLeft' and 'MHF_ArrowRight')
      Returns:
      ItemStack playerhead
